Vlad: Oh please! I am a Khan after all! Even if he is good, he would
not kill me. What would you do of me?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>"
<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Starstorm:
> 
> "He knows that you're here"replied Starstorm "But he hadn't decided 
> what will do with you yet... and isn't good time to make him upset... 
> he was defeated and if you gave troubles... well I can't bet that you 
> would live so long."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" 
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Vlad grinned.
> > 
> > Vlad: Aff. (He left the bars of his cell and looked around the small
> > room) So, Starstorm, do your superiors know I am here, quiaff? What
> > are their plans about me?
